Description: Cylinder seal of black steatite: perforated through the centre, bearing an incised inscription. The seal is in very good condition but its authenticity is not certain.
Curator's comments: The form of the cutting of some of the hieroglyphs does not look like ancient work, even allowing for the peculiar style of Early Dynastic inscriptions. Bibliography: P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit II (Wiesbaden, 1964), 1162.; P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit III (Wiesbaden, 1964), pl. 108, abb. 542.
